entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle. High 11 except 6 along the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 11 except 6 along the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 7:10 AM ADT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
